"Danger from Below":
"I've never seen one myself, but word is there's this
creature called a Caterdransa over in the Skyscape.
From what I heard, it sounds like a subspecies of
the Caterdran over in the Cauldron. But that doesn't
mean you should fight it the same way. I mean,
I'm not gonna go get myself all beat up 'cause I
didn't do my homework-- er, I mean, have YOU
do my homework. Don't let me down!

*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"オレはまだ出くわしたことねーんだけど。
どうも浮遊大陸にゃ、キャタドランサって
やつがいるらしくてさ。
聞いたところじゃ姿かたちは火山洞窟の
やつの亜種っぽい感じらしーんだけどよ。
だからって同じ戦い方でいけるとは
限んねーだろ？
ナメてかかって怪我すんのもいやだしな。
てなわけで、後よろしく！
※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
